name: Home Across The Sea
description:
A BL Visual Novel with point and click adventure about a doctor and a sergeant navy.

Your loved one is a sergeant navy who left for duty every once a year. Things has changed since then, the town has changed, the house has changed, even you changed. 

Change is inevitable. But perhaps, you could help him through that? Hold his hand while you mourn what is lost and celebrate the new things that come.
